name: Cookie.inc
description:
made in 60h for the 7th edition of the Game Factory game jam

Controls :

  • press space to take an object
  • hold space to accelerate the conveyor belt
  • With Box of Cookies , press space when the hand is above the cauldron
  • With Juice , hold space and release when you have the right amount of juice
  • With nuggets box , press space when the number of nuggets is the same as the amount of nuggets that you need

Development Team :

a game by Mathis Jibert
music and sounds by Kayupla [ https://kayupla.bandcamp.com/ ]
